entries.entry: We talked about HTML components and how to make grid layouts with Flexbox in CSS.
I tried to have an element in my Flexbox layout also be another Flexbox layout. It hurt my brain. I hate Steve.
I learned about git,which is a version conrol system and developers collaboration tool. I cloned, pulled, pushed,merged and created branches.
Using js components and modules, we created html representation by manpulating the DOM representation.
